import React from 'react'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faBars, faUser, faSearch } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import { Link,useLocation,useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; function NavBar({ toggleSidebar,handleLogout }) { const location = useLocation(); const history = useHistory(); const excludedPaths = ['/login', '/register', '/forgetps']; const isExcludedPage = excludedPaths.includes(location.pathname); const handleLogoutClick = () => { handleLogout(); // Perform logout actions history.push('/logout'); // Navigate to the logout route }; if (isExcludedPage) { return null; // Don't render the Sidebar on the excluded pages } return (
{/* Navbar Brand */} Student Portal {/* Sidebar Toggle */} {/* Navbar Search */}
{/* Navbar User Menu */}
    • {/*
    • Settings
      • */}
    • Activity Log
    • Logout
); } export default NavBar;
